features: Package Includes:The kids knifes set Package Includes 1 piece of wooden kids knife, 1 piece of cooking knife, 3 pieces serrated edges toddler knives, 2 pieces cutting board, 1 piece Y peeler, 4 pieces sandwich cutters, 1 piece crinkle cutter, a variety of styles and uses of toddler kitchen tools can meet the needs of kids usage requirements.

Healthy and Safe Material:The kids knifes for real cooking is made of wood and High quality food grade polypropylene,the kids knife is made of quality stainless steel and pp material. These kids knives are non-toxic, BPA free materials, safe to use, exquisite workmanship, not easy to break and deform.

Unique & Exquisite Design: The wooden kids knife are light and exquisite, painted with cute patterns of crocodile patterns, which are more attractive. Stimulate your child's interest and let them enjoy cooking time with your family. kids knives with one-piece handle design safe and labor-saving. Serrated edge toddler knife are serrated design, not easy to hurt your hands, sleek handle design to make the grip comfortable and lightweight. Can be used for potatoes, carrots, cucumbers, bananas, etc.

Ability Training for Kids:Our kid safe knives are specially designed for toddlers, kids can cook in the kitchen with mother and encourage their creativity. You could even give them ingredients and let them create their own creations for the whole family to enjoy!

Parents are Children's Best Teachers: These plastic knives can be applied to many occasions,kitchen set can provide children with the conditions to learn to imitate the behavior of adults. Through their own practice, children can improve their hands-on ability, promote parent-child relationship, and learn the living habits of parents.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for ages 3 and up
reviews.reviewText: I bought this set for a 3 year old's birthday to get him more interested in eating fruits and vegetables and he is very capable of using the tools correctly. it does not hold his interest for long because he is much more interested in playing with trucks.However his brother (5) uses them like he is the head cook of the house now and makes his own after school snacks. They are very safe and I am in no way nervous to let them use them.The ANIMAL CUT OUTS are tricky for even myself, so I removed them from the set because we ALL were getting frustrated. The PEELER has worked on a carrot and we are going to try a cucumber next. The GREEN HANDLED CUTTER works great on hard vegetables. KNIVES work great on softer items.Don't forget messes come with learning! Have a blast!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Training Tool
reviews.reviewText: Not only are these great quality, but they are a perfect blend between safety and functionality. The kit definitely requires close supervision, but allows kids some freedom to learn. Our 6 year old was able to chop up some chicken this evening as a contribution towards dinner. Overall very happy with the product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Food prep tools for chefs in the making!
reviews.reviewText: Love to cook? Want to teach your kids or grandkids to enjoy prep and cooking? It is not only fun to work alongside your little ones, but a great way to teach about food, preparation, and how making meals together brings families together. Unlike toddler kitchen toys, these are sturdy and well make to mimic real prep tools. They work great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for little hands
reviews.reviewText: These are perfect t for my 4 and 7 year olds to help in the kitchen. The knives are sharp enough to cut but safe enough for little hands. The items are good quality, wash well and don't rust. I find myself using the cutting boards for myself.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for the toddler “I do it myself” phase
reviews.reviewText: Such a fun and safe way to get my toddler involved in meal prepping with healthy foods. We’re in the “I do it myself” phase and she loves cutting up fruits and veggies. The peeler did eventually break when trying to peel sweet potatoes because it’s made of plastic but it held up well on cucumbers, zucchini, apples, peaches and other soft foods.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My kids love these!
reviews.reviewText: These are a hit for my 2 and 4 year old children. They are both easily able to use the utensils and cut fruit and veggies. Super great that they come with multiple cutting boards as well. Would purchase again and this is a great gift idea for children. Not just “another toy”.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does the job, great gift
reviews.reviewText: Whether you find it cheaper elsewhere or not, the point is this specific set of kid friendly kitchenware is super cute and it works! My toddler grabs his set when he sees me busy in the kitchen and pulls up a chair to help me. Get this if you want to find ways to get your little one involved in the prepping of meals and/or to help sharpen motor skills.Put in dishwasher and it came out the same! If the cutting board slides, just put a damp paper towel under.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not for toddlers
reviews.reviewText: High quality and size for young children. The knives are sharp even with supervision. Not for toddlers. Appropriate, beginning with 4-5 year olds, and with supervision.
